text: Seems that `translations` was removed from pages but apparently still need to use for blog index pages? Half a year ago I was guided by the support to use `translations` instead of `translated_content` and now our language switcher stopped working properly.

<@UM840B04X> Yes, I understand that. But my question is, why is `{% set en_url = group.translations.en.absolute_url %}` not working while `{% set en_url = content.translated_content.en.absolute_url %}` does work. These are both objects and aren’t inside any for loops. The `absolute_url` can only be accessed within a for loop it it’s `group.translations`.
